summary: Ford is an American car company started by Henry Ford in 1903. It's famous for making cars and trucks, and it owns the Lincoln brand for luxury cars. Ford is one of the biggest car companies in the world, ranked sixth in 2022. They created a new way to make cars quickly using assembly lines, called Fordism. Ford has sold some brands like Jaguar and Land Rover but still owns many car companies. They almost had financial trouble in 2008 but recovered and are now profitable again. Ford employs lots of people worldwide and makes millions of cars each year.
title: Ford Motor Company
